name: dsa-visualizer
description: visualizer app for data structure and algorithm

scripts.start:dev: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config server/server.js dotenv_config_path=./.env/.development.env dotenv_config_debug-true override=true
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && node -r dotenv/config server/server.js dotenv_config_path=./.env/.production.env dotenv_config_debug-true override=true

author: ilikeblue
